item.title: Yesterday's US Ethereum Spot ETF Net Inflow: $2.876 billion
item.description: On August 22nd, according to Farside data, yesterday the net inflow of the US Ethereum spot ETF was $287.6 million, bringing an end to a four-day net outflow trend. The specific details are as follows:The net inflow of ETHA was $233.6 million, the net inflow of FETH was $28.5 million, the net inflow of ETHW was $7 million, the net inflow of ETHV was $6.2 million, the net inflow of ETHE was $5.9 million, and the net inflow of Grayscale ETH was $6.4 million.

item.title: Yesterday, the US Spot Bitcoin ETF saw a net outflow of $1.944 billion
item.description: On August 22nd, as per Farside's monitoring, yesterday the net outflow of the US spot Bitcoin ETF was $194.4 million, indicating the fifth consecutive day of net outflows. Here is the breakdown:The net outflow of IBIT was $127.5 million. The net outflow of ARKB was $43.3 million. The net outflow of FBTC was $31.8 million. The net inflow of EZBC was $3.2 million. And the net inflow of Grayscale BTC was $5.2 million.

item.title: Million-Follower KOL Andrew Tate Shorts YZY for a Floating Profit of $12,600
item.description: On August 22, with YZY continuing to decline and falling below $0.8, the multimillion-follower Key Opinion Leader (KOL) Andrew Tate opened a 3x short position in YZY on Hyperliquid this morning at 3:16. Currently, it is showing an unrealized profit of $12,600. His opening price was $0.8523, and the initial position size was $175,000.

item.title: A whale has increased its holdings by 537.66 BTC over the past two weeks, worth over $60 million.
item.description: Update, August 22nd: Based on the monitoring of OnchainLens, a whale received an additional 71 BTC from FalconX today, which is approximately worth $8.05 million. This whale has accumulated a total of 537.66 BTC in the past two weeks, with a total value of around $60.85 million.Address: bc1qgz8daweegcsqgkp7cc36jlkprt0n55cuqh7sgsr09st9fpnhvfxqccgtlw.

item.title: OKAY has dropped nearly 30% in the last 4 hours, bringing its market cap down to $9.57 million.
item.description: On August 22nd, within a period of 4 hours, the X Layer ecosystem meme coin OKAY experienced a sharp decline of nearly 30%. Its market value dropped to $9.57 million, and the 24-hour trading volume reached $7.9 million.BlockBeats hereby reminds users: Meme coins are highly volatile. Please pay attention to asset protection.

item.title: Solana ecosystem privacy protocol Vanish has completed a $1 million Pre-Seed round of funding, with Colosseum leading the investment.
item.description: On August 22nd, the privacy protocol Vanish within the Solana ecosystem announced the completion of a $1 million Pre-Seed financing round. This financing round was led by Colosseum, and it saw the participation of Solana Ventures, Pivot Global, as well as multiple industry-leading angel investors including Solana co-founder toly.In Solana, every transaction requires a trade-off between privacy, compliance, and execution. Vanish enables instantaneous private execution, avoiding the risk of traders being exposed to front-runners or back-runners, thereby reducing the value of their strategies.

item.title: If Bitcoin surpasses $115,000, the mainstream CEX total short liquidation volume will reach $1.642 billion.
item.description: On August 22nd, according to Coinglass data, in the event that Bitcoin breaks through $115,000, the cumulative short liquidation strength of mainstream CEXs will reach $1.642 billion.Conversely, if Bitcoin drops below $111,000, the cumulative long liquidation strength of mainstream CEXs will reach $1.232 billion.BlockBeats Notes: The liquidation chart does not display the exact number of contracts awaiting liquidation or the precise value of contracts being liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to adjacent liquidation clusters, that is, the strength.Therefore, the liquidation chart shows to what degree the asset price will be influenced when it reaches a particular level. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that when the price reaches that level, it will trigger a more intense reaction due to a liquidity cascade.

item.title: Bitcoin Withdrawal Trend Reversal, with a Net Outflow of 1,858.51 BTC from Centralized Exchanges (CEX) in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On August 22nd, according to Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, CEX has witnessed a total net outflow of 1,858.51 BTC. The top three exchanges with the largest outflows are as follows:· Kraken, with an outflow of 3,735.95 BTC;· Binance, with an outflow of 383.19 BTC;· Coinone, with an outflow of 137.40 BTC.In addition, Bitfinex had an inflow of 792.23 BTC, ranking first on the inflow list.

item.title: Ripple Partners with SBI Holdings to Promote Ripple USD (RLUSD) in Japan
item.description: August 22nd. Ripple announced today a fresh Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with the Japanese financial group SBI Holdings and its subsidiary SBI VC Trade Co., Ltd. (a licensed electronic payment instrument trading service provider; hereinafter referred to as the "SBI Group"). The plan is to distribute Ripple USD (RLUSD) in Japan via SBI VC Trade.RLUSD is a reliable enterprise-grade stablecoin that places great emphasis on compliance and transparency. RLUSD undergoes monthly audits by a third-party accounting firm.

item.title: SBI Holdings Launches On-Chain Tokenized Stock Trading Platform, Integrates DeFi Protocol
item.description: August 22: The Japanese financial group SBI Holdings announced today that it is going to form a strategic joint venture with the crypto infrastructure company Startale Group. They will launch an on-chain trading platform for tokenized stocks and real-world assets (RWA). This platform will make use of SBI's financial ecosystem and Startale's blockchain infrastructure to deal with the "key market gap" in traditional tokenized stock products.The upcoming platform is predicted to offer 24/7 trading of tokenized stocks, faster cross-border settlements, and fractionalized ownership to meet the requirements of global customers. The platform will integrate tokenized stocks with DeFi protocols. Other features include:· Advanced account abstraction technology.· Institutional-grade custody.· Real-time international compliance monitoring.This business alliance will establish and operate two joint ventures: one concentrating on core technology development and the other being responsible f
